# Rclust <img src="man/figures/Rclust-logo-small.png" align="right" alt="" width="120" />

[![Travis-CI Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/rafaelslins/Rclust.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/rafaelslins/Rclust)


## Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("rafaelslins/Rclust")
```

## Usage

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(Rclust)
```
